title: Skip Blood Tests For Diabetes: Indian, US Researchers Develop AI-Based Eye Scan
description: A team of Indian and US researchers has developed an artificial intelligence (AI)-based technique to detect diabetes without the traditional blood tests.
content:
New Delhi:

title: US megacap results to test market's tech trade, profit optimism
description: Stakes are high for earnings reports from U.S. megacap companies this week, as investors seek proof that strong profit growth will lift stocks ​this year, including evidence that artificial-intelligence investments are paying off.
content: NEW YORK, Jan 28 (Reuters) - Stakes are high for earnings reports from U.S. megacap companies this week, as investors seek proof that strong profit growth will lift stocks ​this year, including evidence that artificial-intelligence investments are pa... [2665 chars]

title: Is this video AI?
description: It had the hallmarks of an artificial intelligence fake. So I went to check it out.
content:
Good, clean fun on a local Facebook page, it seemed.
But something about the clip seemed off.
I’m a reporter, so I’m skeptical by nature. My eyes were drawn to the uncanny nature of what I was seeing. Did the herky-jerky movements of the people on th... [4204 chars]

title: To avoid accusations of AI cheating, college students turn to AI
description: On college campuses across the United States, the introduction of generative artificial intelligence has sparked a sort of arms race
content:
On college campuses across the United States, the introduction of generative artificial intelligence has sparked a sort of arms race.
Rapid adoption of AI by young people set off waves of anxiety that students could cheat their way through college, l... [13920 chars]

title: Amazon to Cut 16,000 Jobs in Latest Round of Layoffs
description: The e-commerce giant has been cutting costs in part to redirect money into building data centers to compete in the race to dominate artificial intelligence.
content:
Though business has been booming, Amazon said on Wednesday that it was laying off 16,000 more corporate employees as it looked to trim bureaucracy and free up money for plans to spend heavily on artificial intelligence.
The cuts were widely expected ... [413 chars]

title: AI will replace repetitive jobs but create millions more, says govt's top science advisor
description: Artificial Intelligence will disrupt repetitive jobs but open new opportunities across sectors like agriculture and finance, says Principal Scientific Advisor Ajay Kumar Sood, as India expands AI labs and skill programmes nationwide.
content:
New Delhi:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a disruptive technology that is expected to replace many repetitive jobs, while also creating new opportunities. India must be prepared for this major realignment, according to the government’s top science a... [2965 chars]

title: Amazon cuts 16,000 jobs globally to undo pandemic-era hiring amid AI push
description: Jan 28 (Reuters) - Amazon said ‌on Wednesday it was cutting 16,000 jobs worldwide in the second ‌major round of layoffs at the company in three months, ‌as it restructures after pandemic-era over-hiring and expands the adoption of artificial intelligence tools.
